Address.Address1: Avenida Hotu Matua S/N, Hanga Roa, Rapa Nui

Description.Text: Facilities Travellers are welcomed at the hotel, which has a total of 9 rooms. The establishment features a restaurant, a dining area and a bar. Wireless internet access in public areas allows guests to stay connected. Those arriving in their own vehicles can leave them in the car park of the accommodation. Rooms A range of amenities complete the standard fittings of the accommodation units. Most rooms feature a balcony with a view for guests' enjoyment. Features of the rooms include a mini fridge. The hotel offers non-smoking rooms. Sports/Entertainment The establishment offers attractions including sport and entertainment opportunities. A pool and an outdoor pool are available to travellers. The accommodation offers a spa (for a fee) to guests.
